comments.author: Shockwave.1230
comments.body:
Is there going to be an API for user account and character details?

Or is ANet maybe thinking about making their own web app that shows this stuff?

Logically I would think ANet would have to make an app for this info, because you probably don’t want to publically provide account and character for everyone to see. You also can’t password protect the API because you’ll have people building apps that steal password (not our good awesome people, but the ones on the other end of the spectrum)
